code: import _toConsumableArray from"C:/Aradhana/Projects/TODO_REACT_REDUX/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/toConsumableArray.js";import{ADD_TODO,DELETE_ALL,REMOVE_TODO,UPDATE_CHECKBOX,UPDATE_TODO}from'../actions';var initialState=[{id:1,todo:'Buy Laptop',completed:false},{id:2,todo:'Master Redux',completed:false},{id:3,todo:'Watering Plants',completed:true}];export var operationsReducers=function operationsReducers(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case ADD_TODO:return[].concat(_toConsumableArray(state),[action.payload]);case DELETE_ALL:return[];case REMOVE_TODO:console.log('state',state);var filteredTodos=state.filter(function(todo){return todo.id!==action.payload;});return filteredTodos;case UPDATE_TODO:var data=action.payload;var updatedArray=[];state.map(function(item){if(item.id===data.id){item.todo=data.todo;item.completed=data.completed;}updatedArray.push(item);});return updatedArray;case UPDATE_CHECKBOX:var todoArray=[];state.map(function(item){if(item.id===action.payload){item.completed=!item.completed;}todoArray.push(item);});return todoArray;default:return state;}};
